newsitem.title: USA: Western Resources extends Kansas City tender offer.
newsitem.headline: Western Resources extends Kansas City tender offer.

text.p: Western Resources Inc said Monday it extended its tender offer for Kansas City Power & Light Co until December 6 at 1700 EST.
Western Resources said 47 percent or 29.2 million of the outstanding common shares of Kansas City Power had been tendered as November 15 at 1700 EST, the previous expiration for the tender offer.
In June, Western Resources increased its offer to $31 from $28 in Western stock for each share of Kansas City Power stock. The offer is valued at $1.9 billion.
Western Resources and Kansas City Power met on Friday, in what was described as a "cordial meeting" by Kansas City Power. The two companies agreed to meet again in the near future.
Kansas City Power has in the past urged shareholders not to tender.
